name: Succubus
nutshell:
Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: The White Mage Doesn't Want to Raise the Hero's Level
nutshell:
Shina is a high level White Mage who joined up with Izumi Irie, a hero who was summoned to another world. She fell head over heels for Izumi and, not wanting him to get sent back once they take down the Big Bad, wears sexy outfits to distract him during battles. Now he can't concentrate in battles and has not at all been able to level up even once.
Will she ever get his attention? A white mage x summoned hero semi-ecchi isekai love comedy begins!

name: Unlovable Replacement
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell:
When his relationship went down the drain, Chiko Dyer started to develop a weird relationship with a local delivery girl.
Espanol:||Cuando su relación se fue por el desagüe, Chiko Dyer comenzó a desarrollar una extraña relación con una chica de entrega local.||

name: Iyaya Iyaya mo Suki no Uchi?
nutshell: Who would've thought that Masumi, the king of poker faces and a bit of an enigma, had a thing for Yuki? Yuki certainly didn't, until Masumi decided to tell him one day. Yuki finds this hard to believe because Masumi is popular with women and he is even rumored to have a girlfriend. As Yuki panics, Masumi lets him know that he finds Yuki's wide range of facial expressions adorable. Yuki's never been with a guy, so he rejects Masumi at first, but as Masumi keeps confessing his hot, passionate feelings for him, he starts to develop some feelings of his own for the guy…!!

name: Ichido wa Kanojo ni nattemitai!
nutshell: Seri is a 20 years old female college student who has never had a boyfriend; however, one day, she meets Chihiro, a childhood friend who is 2 years younger than her and is now a high school student. Chihiro calls on Seri to help her make up for what she couldn't do due to her hospitalization. Together, they go on a trip and suddenly Chihiro confesses to Seri…

name: Settia
nutshell: Mujin is a half-demon who transforms in and out of his demon form, Lewellyn. But when he reunited with his old friend Eunil, Mujin finds out that their relationship may be headed in a different direction

name: Zan
nutshell:
A samurai manga about a boy named Zan. Zan's father was a legendary swordsman who used a sword which had no blade (think Sakabatou from Ruroken). Zan's father died one day, and ever since, Zan has wanted to follow in his fathers footsteps.
The manga starts off with Zan being transfered to a new high school in his second year. When pushed, Zan somehow becomes super strong and has incredible sword technique that allows him to beat his enemies.

name: Watashi no Ouchi wa Honya-san
nutshell: Nakazawa Miyu is the 5th grade daughter of a bookstore owner. Unfortunately, it's an adult bookstore! Despite her desire for normalcy, she reluctantly helps out the store, much to her regret.

name: Log in Paris
nutshell:
Vlogger Cha-yeon decides to draw provocative content through the 'Thumping Paris Package' in order to increase the number of You Tube subscribers. Partner Jo Han-gyeol, whom I met on a travel destination with a grand dream (?), is a typical engineering nerd man wearing glasses and a checkered shirt. Cha-yeon's disappointment when he was trying to get content by meeting a good-looking partner.... However, as Jo Han-gyeol collided with a cafe employee and drank a drink, his beauty hidden behind thick glasses is revealed. Cha-yeon proposes a contract relationship because of his unexpected beauty... “Tell me the truth. Is this your first time?”


Note:
Part of Bomtoon <Travel Short Stories Vacation Sex> and the 4th Story (Ch.11-13) on <Lezhin>

name: Kazoku ni Nattemimasen ka?
nutshell: Takemura is a distant, workaholic designer in the planning division. While most of his officemates had given up on interacting with him, his loud co-worker Masaki Natsui is persistent on breaking his indifferent demeanor. When one trip to the convenient store leads to Takemura crossing paths with Masaki and his adopted son, Mori, everything changes for Takemura as he is pulled into a somewhat makeshift family dynamic with the two.

name: My Wife Can See The Future
nutshell: Pixiv stories of from "Love, clairvoyance and youth" taken from @GoHome_kun's pixiv, Titled "A wife who can see the future" Please Support them!

name: Prejudice
nutshell: The star of a male idol group who has a cold demeanor, yet has no control on his fading fame and popularity. And an idol with a harmless and childlike cutesy personality on cameras, and a completely opposite persona off-stage… They're sworn enemies that always bite at each other who somehow ends up having to act lovey-dovey with each other as fan service?! Yup, smells nice!

name: Elf-san wa Yaserarenai
nutshell:
A young man, Naoe Tomoaki, works as a consultant at a popular Seitai therapy clinic. He is in charge of the treatment of a woman on her diet course. But the woman is an elf from a different world with sharp ears and a bow! Why are the elves, who should be slender, getting fat? And will her diet succeed!?

Links:

Author's Twitter

name: Lost and Found
nutshell: After Jade’s childhood friend and boyfriend comes to terms with his sexuality and breaks up with her, she stumbles to a nearby park feeling lost and alone. There, she meets a stranger who listens to her story and offers her a place to crash for the night. The handsome stranger is Nathan, a silent and puzzling man who has a tendency to pick up strays from the street.

name: Warring States
nutshell:
I, Ji Qing, crossed into the Gaowu version of the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period.
You have a sword, I can't die!
You have the magic of the world, I can't die!
You have a nearly-godlike move, I still can't die!
An ordinary person who can't die no matter what, how will I fare in this war-torn world of rigorous battles?

name: How We End
nutshell: Walking aimlessly through the ruins of civilization, life had never been better for Lya and Renard. In their world filled with rubble and rain, a faint streak of sunshine can light the darkest streets. Side by side, in search of food, they embark on an endless journey towards the center of the city. Sharing both the warm and cold, the siblings rediscover the disintegrating remnants of humanity.

name: Farewell Witch
nutshell:
Will, a boy who can use healing magic, escapes a research facility with his older sister. Together they travel this broken world to unravel the secrets of his origin.
(Summary by Knox scans)

name: Usachan Ookami
nutshell:
Wolf-kun and Usagi-chan are a couple who belong to very different races. A problem arose within Wolf-kun & Usagi-chan’s relationship…Wolf-kun couldn’t make Usagi-chan cum. The only answer that Wolf-kun could think of was… “What if you embraced me instead?”
Incest CW in the one-shot, chapter 6.

name: Isekai One Turn Kill Nee-san
nutshell:
You know that one series where the main character gets sent to another world, but his mother gets sent with him, and she’s super overpowered but also really doting to the MC?
Yeah, replace “mother” with “big sister” and you have a good idea of what this series is about.
Anyway, join Asahi Ikusaba and his big sister Maya as they have adventures in another world.

name: Spicy Female Boss
nutshell: Jiang Xiao Long had just graduated from university and is a normal worker in the company, but this time he found the keys of his boss, the goddess Gong Mei Ting, and found this "other side" of this female boss that no one knows about. After finding this out, Jiang Xiao Long had many interesting encounters with this female boss and his life started to change.

name: The Ending, I Want to Change it
nutshell: Byun Soo-ah, an impoverished novelist who only writes bad endings, is possessed by someone's curse as Choi Se-hwa, the villain of 'End of Youth', which is currently being serialized. Can Su-ah survive and return to her original world in a novel full of traitors, sociopaths, double personalities, and psychopaths?

name: Zero no Tsukaima - Zero's Summer Holiday (Doujinshi)
My Cute Wish
nutshell: Two Boys, Katsuo and Will, are jogging along a trail when they come across an amulet. Once they touch it, a genie appears and says she will grant one of them one wish. Will passes, and Katsuo makes a very "cute" wish. The results are not quite what either of them expected…

name: Yomekare! The Comforts Of Having A Wifely Boyfriend
nutshell:
Becoming the target of an overly doting man with an "ideal bride" level of housework skills?!
The always overworking Azusa's lover is Shinda-kun, whose housework and loving care are top level.
Coming home to him waiting can relieve even the worst of after-work tension!
We bring you the lovey dovey days of this couple♪

name: Name
nutshell: "Mr. Ghost, won't you tell me your name now?"

name: Koiiro Omoi
nutshell:
I've always, always longed for this. Fancy gossip with friends. And my first love. The girl who thinks this, Ayumu, met the sparkling boy Kanata. When she sees him, her heart beats fast and her chest feels tight. These feelings… is that love?
Also includes two other stories:


Love Ego


Katakoi Iro

name: Shishunki no Futari
nutshell: In order to eliminate the villains that ran rampant around the world, the assassin Tsuji strives to kill everyday. On the day of the junior high school graduation ceremony, he killed the bully as requested, but it was witnessed by his classmate, Shirayuki-san. This is the story of the bloody romance between a killer and his stalker!!

name: Furansushiki Kottou Seikatsu
nutshell:
19th Century Paris, France. On the banks of the Seine River, managing a small antique shop, lives the gifted, self-made shopkeeper William. Along with his promising young apprentice Henri.
The story depicts these two's many adventures together, and the incredible guests that they meet. A magnificent, quirky and romantic antique story!

name: Cursed Manager’s Regression
nutshell:
As a manager for the Bongsan Group, Kim MuJin was a normie that was part of a support team for transcendents, who fought using supernatural powers.
In his role as a wage slave, he was tasked with cleaning up after the oh-so-great transcendents that went around breaking everything. The only sweet reprieve he had was his weekends.
However, one day, he got caught up in a fight between transcendents and died an unfortunate death.
“I knew I’d end up dying from sticking my nose where it doesn’t belong.”
Right as he was thinking so, he woke up. He had regressed to the year 2002.
With this, he thought that he’d finally get to live the life of action-series protagonists in webtoons.
However, his dream was short-lived—he still didn’t have any powers. Instead, he possessed a curse that could cut his once-in-a-lifetime opportunity short.
Can Kim MuJin save himself from his curse and make the most out of his regression?


<Cursed Manager’s Regression> is a part of Grand Cross Universe Story.



<죽음의 신, 하 변호사> Web Novel
<신 우렁각시전> Web Novel
<범이 내려왔다> Webtoon

name: The Art of Gardening
nutshell: A boy discovers that his bonsai has a human form.

name: Bang Dream! - TeethTeethGary's Bandori Single Image Compilation (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
A collection of stand alone single images by TeethTeethGary located here: https://twitter.com/teethteethgary
Note: The genres will vary depending on the image.
Credits for A3's Band Scans: Translator, PR, QC - Miala, Cleaner/Re-Drawer, Typesetter, PR, QC - Lex, Pr, QC - Otto
